title: Girls: The Complete Collection Deluxe
description: Ethan Daniels is a typical bachelor who suffers from one, infallible truth: dealing with the opposite sex can be complicated. One night, he bumps into a mysterious woman who will change his life and maybe even the world.This edition collects the complete run of Girls as a large-format hardcover in a slipcase, and includes all original covers, including variant covers of extra printings. Collects Girls #1â€“24.
author: Joshua Luna
